alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Otter Tail County through 445 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vergas, or 13 miles south of Detroit Lakes, moving east at 30 mph. A second strong thunderstorm was just west of this one near Lake Lida. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perham, New York Mills, Star Lake, Big McDonald Lake, Vergas, Bluffton and Dent. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail
